name: An Old man's Duty
description:
I am not trained as a game designer.

This is my first game I have created.

I am a painter/sculptor.

I am also a teacher, and found this community through means of engaging my students in digital art making. I'm hooked! I love Bitsy.

This game is short: You play an old man who goes into the woods to visit a character as grief stricken as you by your wife's passing. 

*You need to bring the first cat a fish, he gives you a key, which opens a shed.

*Take the treat, and bring it north, then you can go home (your journey complete).
